neayiauth-extensionname: The name of the extension (typically NeayiAuth).
neayiauth-desc: The description of the extension as shown in Special:Version.
neayiauth-pluggable-class-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the classname that extends PluggableAuth.
neayiauth-uri-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the Auth0 domain full url.
neayiauth-client-id-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the Auth0 application client ID.
neayiauth-client-secret-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines theAuth0 application client secret.
neayiauth-redirect-uri: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the redirect URI to handle authentication.
neayiauth-auth-providers-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the list of custom OAuth providers.
neayiauth-auth-provider-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the used authentication provider.
neayiauth-auto-populate-groups-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the list of MediaWiki groups that get automatically assigned to the user after they are authenticated.
neayiauth-pluggable-auth-button-label-me: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the name of the system message that gets shown on Special:UserLogin.
The value of the system message that gets shown on Special:UserLogin.
neayiauth-authentication-failure: Message shown to the user when the authentication failed or when they are not authorised for this wiki.
neayiauth-invalid-username: Message shown to the user when the OAuth provider returns an invalid username.
neayiauth-unknown-auth-provider-class-ex: Exception message shown when the auth provider class was not loaded or found.
neayiauth-unknown-auth-provider-exceptio: Exception message shown when the auth provider was not found.
neayiauth-invalid-auth-provider-class-ex: Exception message shown when the auth provider class does not implement AuthProvider.
neayiauth-initiate-login-failure: Message shown to the user when the communication to the OAuth-provider could not be initialised.
neayiauth-migrate-users-by-username-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines whether ot not to allow account usurpation by username.
neayiauth-user-already-exists-message: Message shown to the user if the username they are trying to register has already been taken and account usurpation is turned off.
